message.description: Message in markdown format. See markdown support for more details.

from.description: ID of User (regular user or a bot) posting the message

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies an entity instance

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity

threadTs.description: Timestamp of the when the first post created the thread

about.description: Data asset about which this thread is created for with format <#E/{enties}/{entityName}/{field}/{fieldValue}

addressedTo.description: User or team this thread is addressed to in format <#E/{enties}/{entityName}/{field}/{fieldValue}
